tns:patch.author: Arty
tns:patch.description: Create the Type of Implementation category

script.lang: SELECT count(*) from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_implementation'

INSERT INTO amp_category_class(id, category_name, keyname, description, is_multiselect, is_ordered) VALUES (nextval('amp_category_class_seq'), 'Type of Implementation' , 'type_of_implementation', '', 'f', 'f');
INSERT INTO amp_category_value(id, category_value, amp_category_class_id, index_column) VALUES (nextval('amp_category_value_seq'), 'Program', (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_implementation'), 0), (nextval('amp_category_value_seq'), 'Project', (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_implementation'), 1), (nextval('amp_category_value_seq'), 'Action', (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_implementation'), 2);
